title: Business Development Executive/Telemarketer/Appointment Setter/Cold Calling
job_overview:
We're looking for highly motivated people that can articulate well and be at ease speaking with high level executives. You'll need to be self motivated but as part of a team you will be well supported. There's lots of training involved to help you succeed, and a great team to support you along your way.

Experience is preferred but more importantly drive, ambition and desire to win are key elements you will have.

This is a great opportunity to be very successful for the right person.

Key Responsibilities
• Create or Develop relationships within your marketing Lists.
• Organise 3-5 First Time Appointments for the Sales Team per week
• Keep your lists updated using HubSpot System

Key Tasks
• Make a minimum of 100 phone calls to prospects per day.
• Build a business relationship with contacts by delivering value using Ziptech content, meetings, and events.
• Identify those that are ready to enter the sales process
• Qualify the suspects Ziptech provides you with.
• Use the telephone, LinkedIn, and email to contact your Nurture list.
• Schedule call backs and manage your activity queue.
• Book 3-5 First Time Appointments (FTA’s) per week with Decision Makers (DM’s) at qualified companies for the Sales Executive.
